import { Component, Output, EventEmitter, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AppServiceService } from 'src/app/service/app-service.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'], }) export class ProductsComponent implements OnInit { products!: any; loading = false; localToken!: string | null; displayAddProductModal: boolean = false; //display button when user records exists in db displayEditProductModal: boolean = false; displayDeleteProductModal: boolean = false; constructor( private api: AppServiceService, private router: Router ){} // products = [ // { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, // { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" }, // { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, // { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" }, // { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, // { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" }, // { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, // { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" }, // { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, // { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" }, // { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, // { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" } // ] // toggle 'add product' modal addProductModal(value: boolean){ this.displayAddProductModal = value; } // toggle 'edit product' modal editProductModal(value: boolean){ this.displayEditProductModal = value; } // toggle 'delete product' modal deleteProductModal(value: boolean, id: string){ this.displayDeleteProductModal = value; this.selectUser = id } ngOnInit(): void { this.loading = true; this.localToken = localStorage.getItem('user_token') this.api.getAllProducts().subscribe({ next: (res) => { this.loading = false; this.products = res; console.log(res); this.router.navigate(['/all-products']); }, error: () => { this.loading = false; console.log('could not get products')} }) } }
